SA16n1274:119: ki ñca bhagavān kālaṃ jñātvā dharmamupadiśati yathā timburukabrāhmaṇādinām |
SA16n1274:122: yathā bhagavānānandamāmantrya chandakasya yogyaṃ bhāvābhāvavyāvartakaṃ sūtramupadiśati |

SA16n1274:126: kecit sattvāḥ karmavipākāvṛtāḥ na vimuktiṃ labhante |

SA16n1274:129: kecit sattvāḥ puruṣaviśeṣamapekṣya kṣīṇāsravāḥ bhavanti yathā śāriputra aśvajitamapekṣya |
SA16n1274:130: kecit sattvā deśamapekṣya kṣīṇāsravāḥ yathā rājā pukkasātiḥ |

SA16n1274:132: kecit sattvā bhagavataḥ tāttvikakāyamapekṣya nirmitakāya ñcāpekṣya kṣīṇāsravā bhavanti |
SA16n1274:134: kiñca bhagavān vividhān saddharmānupadiya sarvān vimuktyāvaraṇadharmān paribhedayati ato vimuktijñānadarśanasampanna ityucyate |
SA16n1274:138: bhagavān satvānāṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ kuśalamūla ñca jñātvā kramaśo dharmamupadiśati |
SA16n1274:139: bhagavān vimuktiṃ pratyakṣīkṛtya parasyopaśati na parataḥśratvā |
SA16n1274:142: tathā jinaśāsanamapi pratipakṣakalāpamukhena sarvān kleśān vyāvartayati |
SA16n1274:143: yathā navasaṃjñādīn mahatyo'lpā vā saṃyojanā na punaḥ kṣapayanti |
SA16n1274:146: kadācit sukumāravacanaiḥ kadācit kaṭuvacanaiḥ kadācit punaḥ sukumārakaṭuvacanaiśca |
SA16n1274:154: asmāt īdṛśaṃ phalaṃ bhavati na tādṛśam |
SA16n1274:155: ayamācāraḥ akuśalo'vayaṃ duḥkhavipākaḥ na sukhavipāka iti jñānam |
SA16n1274:160: yathā yavādyava eva jāyate na brīhyādaya iti |
SA16n1274:161: (u) sthānāsthānabalena karmādīnāṃ jñānāt idaṃ balamatigahanaṃ paramaṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ na prāptuṃ śakyam |
SA16n1274:162: jātadharmasya hetusamanantarādhipatipratyayān pratyāyayatītyata idaṃ balaṃ praṇītam |
SA16n1274:163: (2) yat atitānāgatapratyutpannāni karmāṇi sarvadharmasamādānāni ca prajānāti |
SA16n1274:164: teṣāṃ sthānaṃ prajānāti vastu prajānāti hetuṃ prajānāti vipākañca prajānāti |
SA16n1274:169: ato bhagavataḥ teṣāṃ kathanaṃ balaṃ bhavati |

SA16n1274:174: ataḥ kecit saṃśerate anāgatādhvā'pi pratyutpannasama iti |
SA16n1274:176: catvāri dharmasamādānāni pratyutpannaṃ duḥkhaṃ āyatyāṃ sukhavipākam,

SA16n1274:188: bhagavāneva prajānāti taratamaṃ karma yadi niyatamaniyataṃ vā dṛṣṭavipākam upapadyavipākaṃ tadūrdhvavipākaṃ vā ityādi |
SA16n1274:191: (3) bhagavān sarvadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ saṃkleśaṃ prajānāti sthitiṃ prajānāti upacayaṃ prajānāti vyavadānañca prajānāti |
SA16n1274:192: tatra dhyānaṃ nāma catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārūpyasamādhayaśca |

SA16n1274:212: atha śraddhāpratipat dharmapratipat iti dvividho mārgaḥ |
SA16n1274:218: prājñajanā viśiṣṭendriyā adhimuktita upakṛtā średdhendriyapradhānāśca bhavanti |
SA16n1274:225: tathāgato yathādhimukti pratipattiṃ prajānāti yadutāyaṃ sattvaḥ pañcakāmanāsvadhimuktaḥ bhāvanāmārge bādhimukta ityevaṃ viditvā yathārhaṃ dharmamupadiśati |
SA16n1274:228: sattvānāṃ yat dīrghakālamabhyasya abhirocate sa dhātuḥ sidhyati |
SA16n1274:231: kecit sattvāḥ svabhāvataḥ pravṛttarāgāḥ kecit dṛṣṭaṃ pratītya pravṛttarāgāḥ |
SA16n1274:234: imāṃ pratipadaṃ pratipanno naraka utpadyate yāvatsvarge iti ca prajānāti |
SA16n1274:244: narakapratitasyāpi pravibhāgo'sti anena karmaṇā sañjīvanarake patiṣyati,
SA16n1274:246: atastathāgataḥ saptamabale sthitaḥ sukṣmaṃ karma prajānāti |

SA16n1274:252: tathāgato'tītaṃ sarvamupapattisthānaṃ rūpadhātau vā ārupyadhātau vā ityanusmarati |
SA16n1274:256: (9) tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati anāgatādhvani tribhavasantānān trividhāni karmāṇi caturdharmasamādānāni ca jñātvā vyākaroti |
SA16n1274:275: eṣu caturṣu yadi kaścidāgatya yathā dharmaṃ codayet |

SA16n1274:296: keṣāñcitpuruṣāṇāṃ jñāne satyapi vyākaraṇakauśalābhāvāt parapuruṣāṇāṃ vijayo vaiśāradyam |

SA16n1274:309: tatra na kaścidasti yaṃ tathāgato na vijitavān |
SA16n1274:311: yo vādī vacanakuśalaḥ arthakuśalaśca sa viśāradaḥ |
SA16n1274:317: sarvasūtrāṇi sarvaśāstrāṇi ca pratividhya praśnavisarjanaṃ paridīpayatīti viśāradaḥ |
SA16n1274:318: kecitpunaḥ kule gotre rūpe śīlabāhuśrutyajñānādiṣu vā vikalā ityataḥ sāvadyaṃ śāstramadhigacchanti |
SA16n1274:326: yaḥ punaścaturbhirvāda dharmaiḥ samanvitaḥ so'pi durjayaḥ duṣprakampaḥ |
SA16n1274:331: devamanuṣyā api taṃ na jetuṃ śaknuvanti ityato viśāradaḥ |
SA16n1274:332: yaśca kalyāṇamitramanupasevya vādaṃ karoti sa sukampaḥ |
SA16n1274:333: tathāgatastu dīpaṅkarādiṣu apramāṇabuddheṣu pūrvamevābhyastavādadharmā ityato na prakampyaḥ |
SA16n1274:343: śāstraṃ puna dvividhaṃ tattvaśāstraṃ śaṭhaśāstram iti |
SA16n1274:349: tīrthikānāṃ śāstrāṇi sahetvābhāsāni na sahetukāni iti na vijayasamarthāni bhavanti |
SA16n1274:350: bhagavataḥ sūtrāṇi pariśuddhapravacanārthagatikāni tattvalakṣaṇāvilomakāni na tīrthikīyasamānāni |
SA16n1274:353: yathoktaṃ sūtre-bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantyāha mā bhikṣavo mama vacanādhimuktikā bhavata |
SA16n1274:357: prātarvo dharmaṃ bhāṣamāṇe mayi sāyaṃ mārga labhedhvam |
SA16n1274:368: bhagavān sattvānāmuttamo mahān iti alpajñānāṃ śāstraṃ jānāti |
SA16n1274:370: tīrthikānāṃ śāstraṃ yāṃ kāñcit dṛṣṭimupādāya pravṛttam |
SA16n1274:378: tathāgatastu sarvākārajñaḥ sarvadharmajñaḥ sarvaparaśāstrāṇāṃ dārako na paraśāstrairdāryo bhavati |
SA16n1274:389: sa śrāvakaḥ śāstā kṣayajñānasampanna ityataḥ sarvāṇi vaiśāradyāni sāmānyata uktāni |
SA16n1274:390: (pṛ) sattvāḥ kasmāt saṃśerate tathāgato'sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti |
SA16n1274:393: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yaḥ kaścit nagaraṃ praviśya tannāma nāgarikān pṛcchati |
SA16n1274:395: śrotā'sya sūtrasya saṃśete tathāgato'sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti |
SA16n1274:397: yathoktaṃ sūtre-bhagavānāha svāgataṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ anena kāyena mahārthalābhāya mama śāsanamanuvartadhvam |
SA16n1274:403: yathātmānamadhikṛtyāha ahaṃ pariṣadi siṃhakalpo daśabalaiścaturbhirvaiśāradyaiśca samanvitaḥ mahāpariṣadi siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi iti |
SA16n1274:406: āha ca devadattam-nāhaṃ dadāmi saṅghaṃ śāriputramaugdalyāyanādibhyo'pi kiṃ punardāsyāmi tubhyam |
SA16n1274:408: alpajñā imāni vacanāni śrutvā vadanti tathāgatasyasravā akṣīṇā iti |
SA16n1274:416: ato'lpajñāḥ saṃśerate āryamārgaḥ saṃyojanānāṃ na kṣayakṛta iti |
SA16n1274:421: yathā laukikā jānanto'pi praṣṭāro na duṣyanti |
SA16n1274:423: laukikā anāsaṅgacittā api āsaṅgikalpaṃ vadanti īdṛśamiti |
SA16n1274:425: kāmā nāntarāyikadharmā iti sati vacane tatra tathāgata upadiśati kāmā vastuta āntarāyikadharmā iti |
SA16n1274:426: yasya kāmāścittagatāḥ sa na mārgaṃ bhāvayati |
SA16n1274:427: ato'vaśyaṃ kāmān pūrvaṃ parityajya paścānmārgaṃ spṛśati |
SA16n1274:428: āpattidharme satyapi mārgaḥprāpyata iti brūvato'vaśyaṃ paribhinne'pyāpattidharme mārgo na prāpyate |
SA16n1274:430: tasya gurupratyayatvāt bhagavān punaḥkhayamāśrāvayet nāstyāpattidharmo vināśayitum iti |
SA16n1274:440: atha sūtra uktaṃ-tathāgatādīnāṃ daśa guṇāḥ yaduta tathāgataḥ arhan samyak sambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavit anuttarapuruṣadaumyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān iti |
SA16n1274:441: tathāgata iti yathābhūtamārgayānena saṃsādhitasamyaksambodhitvāt tathāgata ityucyate |
SA16n1274:442: yadyadupadiśati sarvaṃ tattvameva bhavati na mṛṣā |
SA16n1274:448: atrāntarāle yat bhāṣate tat satyameva bhavati nānyathā |
SA16n1274:450: sarvākārasarvajñajñānena pūrvāparaṃ parīkṣya paścādupadiśatītyata upadiṣṭaṃ satyameva bhavati |
SA16n1274:451: kiñca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ smṛtirdṛḍhā bhavati na muṣitā |
SA16n1274:452: kecidanumāya yadupadiśaṃti tat kadācit sūtrānuyāyi bhavati |
SA16n1274:454: tairupadiṣṭhaṃ lābhāya vā bhavati hānāya vā |
SA16n1274:455: yathoktaṃ sūtre-anumāturvacanaṃ lābhāya kadācit bhavati hānāya vā kadācit |
SA16n1274:461: yathoktaṃ sūtre-bhagavān sattvānāṃ cittaprāmodyamadhimukti ñca prajñāya mārgamupadiśati iti |
SA16n1274:464: yathoktaṃ kiṃśukaśirṣaka sūtre yo dharma upadeśārhaḥ tamupadiśati saṃkṣepato vistarato vā skandhāyatanādimukhena iti |
SA16n1274:466: atha punardharmāvavādo dvividhaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ paramārthata iti |
SA16n1274:467: tathāgata idaṃ satyadvayaṃ niśrityopadiśatītyata upadiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ tattvaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1274:468: bhagavān nopadiśati yat saṃvṛtisatyaṃ tat paramārthasatyamiti |
SA16n1274:469: na ca yat paramārthasatyaṃ tat saṃvṛtisatyamiti |
SA16n1274:471: atha tathāgatena yadi vā saṃvriyate yadi vā vivriyate tadubhayamapyaviruddham |
SA16n1274:472: yat saṃvaraṇāya bhavati na tat vibriyate |
SA16n1274:473: yat vivaraṇāya bhavati na tat saṃvriyate |
SA16n1274:478: santi ca caturvidhā avavādāḥ darśanaśravaṇamananidhyaptidharmā iti |
SA16n1274:479: bhagavāneṣu caturṣu dharmeṣu yadyadupadiśati tat sarvaṃ cittavyavadānāya bhavati nāsaṅgāya |
SA16n1274:481: eṣu pañcasu bhagavān sambuddhaḥ san vyaktaramabhijñāyopadiśati |
SA16n1274:489: anityatādinā dharmān samyak bhāvayataḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyante |
SA16n1274:492: pūrvāntāparāntayośca nāsti santatiriti samyak pratisambudhyata iti samyak sambuddha iti nāma |
SA16n1274:494: anye'pi puruṣā anādisaṃsāre dānādīn dharmānācaranti na samyagācarantīti na sugata ityucyante |
SA16n1274:495: bhagavān punardānādicaryāḥ samyaṅmārgeṇa caritavāniti sugata ityucyate |
SA16n1274:504: kecit vicikitsante kathaṃ manuṣyeṇa devā avavadituṃ śakyanta iti |
SA16n1274:506: buddha iti atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ saṃskṛtā-saṃskṛtasakṣayākṣayāṇāṃ sthūlasūkṣmādīnāṃ vā sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇām |
SA16n1274:507: bodhimūle niṣadya avidyāmiddhamavidhya sarvajñānojvalitāṃ mahābodhiṃ labdhavāniti buddhaḥ |
SA16n1274:508: evaṃ navabhirguṇaiḥ sampanna triṣu adhvasu daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu ca pūjya iti bhagavān |
SA16n1274:509: bhagavān daśanāmasampannaḥ svātmasampadā parasampadā ca ātmānamupakaroti parāṃścopakarotītyato'bhivandyaḥ ||
SA16n1274:514: na hi santi tathāgatasya kāyikavācikamānasikaduścaritāni yāni[tathāgato rakṣitu]micchet mā paro drakṣyāt mā ca jñāsīt iti |
SA16n1274:515: anyeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ santi kadācidavyākṛtābhāsāni kāyikavācikamānasikaduścaritāni vidvadgarhaṇīyāni |
SA16n1274:523: tathāgataḥ kāyena subhāvitavān śīlasamādhiprajñā stattulyān dharmāśca |
SA16n1274:524: ataḥ sarvāṇyakuśalāni akuśalābhāsāni ca karmāṇi sarvathā parikṣīṇāni |
SA16n1274:527: tathāgataḥ sadā śīlamācarati adhimuktito na durgatipatanabhayādinā |
SA16n1274:528: tathāgatasya ca sarvāṇi kāyikavācikamānasikakarmāṇi paropakārāya bhavanti iti nākuśalāni |
SA16n1274:532: dharma upadiśyamāne yadi śrotā ekāgracitto bhavati |
SA16n1274:539: sarvadharmāṇāmatyantaśūnyatāṃ jñātavāniti na daurmanasyaṃ na vā saumanasyam |
SA16n1274:540: susañcitamahākaruṇācittatvāt tathāgataḥ kuśale akuśale ca vinā saumanasyadaurmanasyādi mahākaruṇāmevotpādayati |
SA16n1274:541: tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ pṛthak pṛthak svabhāvamatigahanaṃ parijñātavānityato yadi kaścit kuśalacittaḥ śṛṇoti nānena sumanasko bhavati |
SA16n1274:542: yadi akuśacittaḥ śṛṇoti nānena durmanasko bhavati |
SA16n1274:554: mahākaruṇayā saṃsādhito'nuttaro mārgo na punaranyaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ |
SA16n1274:555: atha punastathāgatasya nāsti kāpīcchā-mama paramā santuṣṭiriti |
SA16n1274:558: mahākāruṇikatvāt bhavaduḥkhahṛdvacanena mahopāye na sattvānāmuddharaṇāya vyavasāyaduḥkhānyupādatte |
SA16n1274:559: tathāgato mahākaruṇayā sattvānāmuddharaṇāya loke'smin taptāyaḥpiṇḍavat kṣaṇamapyasahyaṃ pañcaskandhātmakaṃ kāyamupādāya viharati |
SA16n1274:560: bhagavān buddhaḥ subhāvitopākṣācittaḥ tadupekṣācittamupekṣya sadā mahākaruṇācittamācarati |

SA16n1274:1227: atha parapravāda sūtre'pi bhagavān saṃśrāvayati sma |
SA16n1274:1229: udāyibhikṣudharmadinnādibhibhikṣuṇībhiḥ kṛtaṃ bhagavacchāsanaṃ bhagavān śrutvā [tadeva punaḥ] śrāvayati sma |
SA16n1274:1232: evamanyaḥ “tathāgatamūlāḥ sarvadharmā” ityādi praśnaḥ sarvaḥ pratyuktaḥ |
SA16n1274:1235: śāstre viracitte hi arthaḥ sugamaḥ syāt |
SA16n1274:1240: ataḥ sūtrādarthamādāya śāstraṃ nikāyānta rātmanā pṛthak sthāpyate |
SA16n1274:1242: kiñca bhagavān nānāsattvānāṃ santaraṇīyānāṃ kṛte lokādīni śāstramukhānyuktavān |
SA16n1274:1244: svātyādayo bhikṣava āhuḥ-tadevedaṃ vijñānaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati |
SA16n1274:1254: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet |
SA16n1274:1259: āha ca-dīrgharātraṃ bhāvitacitto mṛta ūrdhvajanmabhāk bhavati |
SA16n1274:1266: yathoktaṃ sūtre eṣu pañcasu skandheṣu nāstyātmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā |
SA16n1274:1271: yathā bhagavān āha-skandhānāṃ santatyā'sti saṃsāra iti |
SA16n1274:1277: [yathā vā] mṛgā ramāteti snuṣāṃ māteti vadanti |
SA16n1274:1280: jihvāvijñānaṃ rasaṃ vijānāti na tu jihvā |
SA16n1274:1281: yathā śaktipratihataṃ puruṣaṃ prati vadanti puruṣo'yaṃ duḥkhaṃ vijānātīti |
SA16n1274:1284: yathā vā daridraḥ puruṣaḥ prabhuriti vyapadiśyate |
SA16n1274:1286: kiñca bhagavān tīrthikānākārayati brāhmaṇāniti śramaṇāniti ca |
SA16n1274:1287: kṣatriyabrāhmaṇādaya iva buddho'pi vyavahārataḥ pūjyo bhavati |
SA16n1274:1293: yathoktaṃ sūtre-pratītyasamutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ cakṣurādīnāmindriyāṇāṃ mūlaṃ mahāsamudravat |
SA16n1274:1294: yathāha sūtram-skandhāyatanadhātūnāṃ pratyayāḥ sāmagrīmātram na kārakaḥ nāpi vedakaḥ iti |
SA16n1274:1296: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yat laukikā vadanti sukhamiti [tat] āryā duḥkhaṃ vadanti |
SA16n1274:1297: yat āryā duḥkhaṃ vadanti [tat]laukikāḥ sukhaṃ vadanti |
SA16n1274:1302: yatra rūpamityākhyāyate tatra yadatītaṃ yadanāgataṃ vartamānam sarvaṃ tat rūpamityucyate |
SA16n1274:1307: na tu sarvaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśasya hetūkriyate |
SA16n1274:1308: tṛṣṇasti cet avaśyaṃ sā vedanāmupādāyaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1274:1309: na tu sarvā vedanā tṛṣṇāyā hetūkriyate |
SA16n1274:1310: kadācit samagraheturucyate yathā sparśapratyayā vedanā iti |
SA16n1274:1311: kadācidasamagra heturucyate yathā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā iti |
SA16n1274:1317: iti ca caturbhirdhyānaiḥ prasrabdhimānapi na sukhaṃ vedayate |
SA16n1274:1320: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yaścai-tyavandanāya pādāvutkṣipati sa āyuṣo'nte deveṣūtpadyate iti |
SA16n1274:1326: strota āpannaḥ puruṣaḥ kāmānupabhuñjāno'pi na durgatipatanīyaṃ karma karoti iti |
SA16n1274:1328: api coktaṃ sūtre-cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate iti |
SA16n1274:1330: yadi tadaiva sarvāṇi rūpāṇi pratītya cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata iti vadet |
SA16n1274:1332: atha coktaṃ sūtre-śrotraṃ pratītya śabdañca śrotravijñānamutpadyate na cakṣurvijñānam |
SA16n1274:1340: kiñcāha-sarve saṃskṛtadharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ [teṣāṃ]nirodho nirvāṇam ityādi mukhaṃ viniścitam |
SA16n1274:1357: yathocyate-adbhuta mūlikā surabhipuṣpañca na vātarogapratikūlam iti |
SA16n1274:1361: kiñca vadanti tisro vedanā-duḥkhā vedanā sukhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti |
SA16n1274:1366: āha ca-duḥkhamidaṃ trividhaṃ navaṃ purāṇaṃ madhyamiti |
SA16n1274:1378: yathā ekavastukathane anyadapi vastu samalakṣaṇamuktaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1274:1382: yathā bhagavānā ha-ya udayavyayalakṣaṇadṛṣṭidvayaṃ na prajānāti sa sarvaḥ sarāgī bhavati |
SA16n1274:1388: yathocyate-annadānaṃ prayacchati pañca guṇān-āyuḥ varṇaṃ balaṃ sukhaṃ pratibhānam iti |
SA16n1274:1393: api tu kārṣāpaṇamupādāya labdhamadyate ityataḥ kārṣāpaṇamadyata ityucyate |
SA16n1274:1403: yathā vadanti-upacitadharmāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sukha iti |
SA16n1274:1430: yathā vadanti-kaścinmuṇḍitakeśaśmaśruko dharmapaṭaṃ paridadhānaḥ parigṛhītabuddheryāpatho'pi bhagavacchāsanād dūrībhūtaḥ |
SA16n1274:1432: yastu śraddhendriyādisamanvāgataḥ sa gṛhastho'pi aprākṛta ityucyate |
SA16n1274:1433: yathoktaṃ sūtre-caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ kaścit saṅghasyeryāpathe'vatīrṇaḥ na saṅghagaṇitaḥ |
SA16n1274:1444: śraddhendriyalipsunā bhagavacchāsanaṃ śrutvā uddiṣṭaṃ prātimokṣamādāya yathāvaccaritavyam |
SA16n1274:1446: kiñcānena śāstreṇa dvividhaṃ hitaṃ bhavati ātmahitaṃ parahitamiti |
SA16n1274:1452: ya ātmanā śīlādīn sampādayati na parān śīlādiṣu sthāpayati |
SA16n1274:1455: yat kaścidātmahitāya pratipanno'pi pareṣāñca dānādimahāphalaṃ sampādayati |
SA16n1274:1460: sa ātmanā dharmacaryāmanuvartamāno'pi parārthamupadeśāt ātmano'pi hitamanuprāpnoti |
SA16n1274:1461: yathoktaṃ sūtre-parasyadharmamupadiśan pañcavidhaṃ hitaṃ labhate iti |
SA16n1274:1463: tatra pravacanamātrasyottamaṃ hitaṃ bhavati yadyathoktamācarata āsravāḥ kṣīyante iti |
SA16n1274:1467: atha sa puruṣa idānīṃ jyotiṣi sthitaḥ paścādapi jyotiḥ parāyaṇo bhavati |
SA16n1274:1468: laukikāḥ sarve bhūyasā tamastamaḥ parāyaṇāḥ jyotiṣo jyotiḥ parāyaṇā vā |
SA16n1274:1469: yaḥ kaścid buddhaśāsanamācarati sa tamaso jyotiḥ parāyaṇaḥ jyotiṣo jyotiḥ parāyaṇo vā bhavati |
SA16n1274:1471: dānādīnācaran na [tādṛśaṃ] hitaṃ vindate yādṛśaṃ buddhadharmaṃ śṛṇvan [vindate] |
SA16n1274:1472: yaścālpa[mapi] buddhapravacanaṃ śṛṇoti sa prativedhajñānalābhī san sarvakleśān bhaṅktvā apramāṇahitaṃ prasavati |
SA16n1274:1473: yaktoktaṃ sūtre-catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ-tamastamaḥparāyaṇaḥ tamojyotiḥparāyaṇaḥ jyotirjyotiḥ parāyaṇaḥ jyotistamaḥparāyaṇaḥ iti |
SA16n1274:1474: kiñca caturvidhāḥ parāyaṇāḥ anussrotogāmī pratisrotogāmī sthitātmā,
SA16n1274:1476: yaścittaikāgryeṇa bhagavaddharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa eva pañca nīvaraṇāni prahāya saptabodhyaṅgāni bhāvayati |
SA16n1274:1479: punaścaturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ-sadābhavanimagnaḥ kañcit kālaṃ bhavānnirgatya punarnimagnaḥ,
SA16n1274:1483: kaścit laukikaśraddhādīnutpādya na dṛḍhayati panaḥ parihīyate |
SA16n1274:1485: yaḥ śraddhādīnutpādya śubhāśubhaṃ vivecayati sa nirgamaparīkṣakaḥ |
SA16n1274:1487: yo bhagavaddharmasya samyagarthaṃ vetti sa naiva sadā nimagno bhavati |
SA16n1274:1489: sa ca guṇābhāvayitetyucyate yaḥ kāyena śīlaṃ manasā prajñāṃ ca bhāvayati sa kiñcid duṣkarma kurvannapi durgatau patati |
SA16n1274:1490: yastu bhāvayati kāyena śīlaṃ manasā prajñāṃ sa bahu duṣkarma kurvannapi na durgatau patati |
SA16n1274:1492: kāyaṃ bhāvayan krameṇa śīlasamādhiprajñāskandhānutpādya karmāṇi prajahāti |
SA16n1274:1499: samanantaro yo mṛdumadhyānuśayaḥ sa sadāgatya cittaniviṣṭo bhavati |
SA16n1274:1501: caturtho yo mṛdumadhyānuśayaḥ sa kaśmiṃñcitkāla āgacchati |
SA16n1274:1502: sa yadi bhagavataḥ śāsane samyacchāsraṃ śṛṇoti |
SA16n1274:1507: nāsti puṇyapāpaṃ [nāsti] karmaphalamiti mithyādṛṣṭau yaḥ patati saparāneva vyābādhate |
SA16n1274:1508: yaddānamācarati sa ātmānamapi vyābādhate parānapi vyābādhate |
SA16n1274:1516: yathoktaṃ sutre kathāsamprayogeṇa [pudgalo] veditavyo yadi vā kathyo yadi vā'kathya iti |
SA16n1274:1517: yo viduṣāṃ dharmaṃ pṛṣṭhaḥ sthānāsthāne na santiṣṭhati |
SA16n1274:1525: yathā nāthaputrādayaḥ svayaṃ vadanti asmākaṃ śāstā āptaḥ tadvacanamevānuvartāmaha iti |
SA16n1274:1539: ātmano vā mānasikī tuṣṭhiḥ āryapravacanadharmaḥ iti |
SA16n1274:1540: tatra yo bhagavaddharma samyak jñātvā pravakti sa kathyo bhavati | nānye |
SA16n1274:1543: vibhajya vyākaraṇīyaṃ praśnaṃ na vibhajya vyākaroti |
SA16n1274:1544: pratipṛcchāvyākaraṇīyaṃ praśnaṃ na patipṛcchya vyākaroti sthapanīyaṃ praśnaṃ na sthapayitvā vyākaroti |
SA16n1274:1548: [tena] yathā buddho bhagavān [tathā] loke nāsti tatsama itīdṛśamanumānaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1274:1555: sthapanīyaḥ praśna iti yo dharmo'bhūtarūpaḥ kintu prajñaptisan |
SA16n1274:1557: kiṃ śāśvataḥ utāśāśvata ityādi yadi kaścit pṛcchati |
SA16n1274:1561: kiñca santi caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ-sāvadyaḥ badyabahulaḥ alpāvadyaḥ anavadya iti |
SA16n1274:1562: sāvadya iti yasya kevalamakuśalaṃ naiko'pi kuśaladharmo'sti |
SA16n1274:1569: bhagavacchāsanasya samyagarthavedī dvaividhyaṃ bhajate alpavadyo'navadya iti |
SA16n1274:1576: yathoktaṃ sūtre-catvāri saṅgrahavastūni-dānaṃ priyavacanamarthacaryā samānārthatā iti |
SA16n1274:1590: tadā te sattvā na prakampyā bhavanti |
SA16n1274:1595: yadyapi kaścidevaṃ vadet mayā bhagavataḥ sammukhāt śrutaṃ bhadantaśca sammukhādvā pūrvānte śrutamiti |
SA16n1274:1597: yadvacanantu sūtre'vatīrṇaṃ dharmalakṣaṇāviruddhaṃ vinayānuloimitañca tatpunarādeyaṃ syāt iti |
SA16n1274:1602: tadyathā kaścit saṃskṛtadharmāḥ śāśvatāḥ sukhāḥ sātmāna iti bhāvayati |
SA16n1274:1604: anityā duḥkhā anātmāna iti yo bhāvayati |
SA16n1274:1606: anityatādijñānameva dharmalakṣaṇam dharmo'yaṃ śaraṇīkartavyo na pudgalāḥ |
SA16n1274:1607: dharmapratiśaraṇaṃ vadatā sarve dharmāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti |
SA16n1274:1608: ataḥ punarucyate nitārthasūtrapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na neyārthasūtrapratiśaraṇeneti |
SA16n1274:1610: yaducyate arthapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na vyañjanapratiśareṇa iti |
SA16n1274:1611: yo'yaṃ vyañjanārthaḥ sūtre'vatīrṇo dharmalakṣaṇāvirodhī vinayānulomakaśca tatpratiśaraṇena bhavitavyam |
SA16n1274:1624: pratirūpadeśavāsaḥ satparuṣopāśrayaḥ ātmanaḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā |
SA16n1274:1628: pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā nāma yat bādhiryamūkatādyabhāvaḥ |
SA16n1274:1629: ātmanaḥ samyak praṇidhānaṃ nāma samyak darśanamidam |
SA16n1274:1631: asya śāstrasyādhyetā cāsminnevāyuṣi satyaprativedhākhyaṃ mahāsārārthaṃ labhate |
SA16n1274:1632: yathoktaṃ sutre-catvāraḥ sāradharmāḥ vacanasāraḥ samādhisāro darśanasāro vimuktisāra iti |
SA16n1274:1635: sarve anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirodho nirvāṇamiti yadvacanam |
SA16n1274:1638: imaṃ samādhimupādāya saṃskṛtadharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ ityādi bhāvanā samyagdarśanaprāpiṇī bhāvanāmayaprajñāparipūraṇamityucyate |
SA16n1274:1647: śrutasaddharmā san yoniśo manaskāramutpādya anityādinā dharmān samyagbhāvayati |
SA16n1274:1648: anayā bhāvanayā dharmānudharmaṃ pratipadyate yadutānāsravaṃ darśanam |
SA16n1274:1655: śūnyatādarśanena kleśānāṃ viyogaṃ labhata iti tyāgādhiṣṭhānam |
SA16n1274:1657: kiñca bhagavacchāsanasya samyacchāstraṃ śrutavataścatvāri nirvāṇagāmini kuśalamūlāni aṅkurībhavanti yaduta ūṣmadharmo mūrdhadharmaḥ kṣāntidharmo laukikāgradharma iti |
SA16n1274:1658: anityādyākāreṇa pañcaskandhān bhāvayato'varaṃ mṛdu nirvāṇagāmi kuśalamūlaṃ cittasyoṣmakaramutpadyate |
SA16n1274:1670: yastathāgatasya dharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa hānabhāgīyaṃ visaṃyujya trīṇi kuśalamūlāni pratilabhate ||
SA16n1274:1673: atha yastāthāgatadharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa catussatyāni savibhaṅgāni samprajānāti duḥkhasatyaṃ,
SA16n1274:1680: santi ca catasro vijñānasthitayo rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā iti |
SA16n1274:1683: santi ca catasro jātayaḥ-aṇḍajo jarāyujaḥ saṃsvedeja aupapāduka iti |
SA16n1274:1687: catvāra āhārāḥ-kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ audārikaḥ sūkṣmo vā |
SA16n1274:1691: manaḥsañcetanāhāro yat kadācit puruṣāḥ sañcetanāpraṇidhānena jīvati |
SA16n1274:1692: vijñānāhāraḥ antarābhavikanārakārūpyā nirodhasamāpattipraviṣṭhāḥ satvā adṛṣṭavijñānā api vijñānapratilambhe vartanta ityato vijñānāhārā ityucyante |
SA16n1274:1700: caturbhirmahābhūtaiḥ parivṛtaṃ vijñānamadhyakamākāśaṃ puruṣa iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati |
SA16n1274:1701: ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni cakṣurādīni ṣaḍindriyāṇi vijñānasaṅgatāni sparśāyatanamityākhyāyante |
SA16n1274:1703: āsu sthitiṣu viparyayabalāt vijñānaṃ sābhirāmaṃ tiṣṭhati |
SA16n1274:1704: aṣṭau lokadharmāḥ-lābho'lābho yaśo'yaśo nindā praśaṃsā sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti |
SA16n1274:1709: sarve ca dharmāḥ pañcadhā vikalpyante-pañca skandhāḥ dvādaśāyatanāni aṣṭādaśa dhātavo dvādaśa nidānāni dvāviṃśatirindriyāṇi iti |
SA16n1274:1712: yat cittaṃ strī puruṣaḥ śatrubandhurityādisaṃjñāṃ janayati |
SA16n1274:1714: śatrurbandhurmadhyastha iti yat puruṣaṃ vikalpayati tat tisro vedanā janayati |
SA16n1274:1716: āsu tisṛṣu vedanāsu yat trividhāḥ kleśā utpadyante |
SA16n1274:1718: eṣāṃ pravṛttyā kāyopādānānyupādatta iti pañcopādānaskandhā ityucyante |
SA16n1274:1719: caturbhiḥ pratyayai vijñānamutpadyate yaduta hetupratyayaḥ samanantarapratyaya ālambanapratyayo'dhipatipratyayaśceti |
SA16n1274:1725: tatra vijñānaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate yat cakṣuḥrūpaṃ yāvanmano dharmān |
SA16n1274:1730: dvādaśasu parvasu vartitvāt dvādaśa nidānāni bhavanti |
SA16n1274:1733: imau dvāvupādāya kramaśa utpadyante-vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca |
SA16n1274:1738: imāni dvādaśa nidānāni atītānāgatavartamānasandarśanāni kevalamupādanapratyayarūpāṇi anātmakāni |
SA16n1274:1741: tadvijñānaṃ cakṣurādibhyaḥ ṣoḍhā samutpadyate iti ṣaḍindriyāṇyucyante yat cakṣurindriyaṃ yāvanmanaindriyamiti |
SA16n1274:1746: ebhyaḥ ṣaḍbhya utpadyamānaṃ ṣoḍhā vijñānaṃ jīvitamityucyate |
SA16n1274:1748: imāni ṣaḍāyatanānīti ṣaḍvijñānānīti santānapravṛttiṃ labhanto ityato jīvitamityucyate |
SA16n1274:1756: tebhyaḥ pañcendriyebhyaḥ kāmatṛṣṇādayaḥ sarve kleśāḥ kāyikavācikakarmāṇi ca prādurbhavanti |
SA16n1274:1776: yat prajñapticittaṃ dharmacittaṃ śūnyatācittamityeṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ cittānāṃ nirodho nirodhasatyamityucyate |
SA16n1274:1778: yatsaptatriṃśadvodhipakṣikā dharmāḥ catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri pradhānāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni saptabodhyaṅgāni aṣṭāvāryamārgāṅgāni iti |
SA16n1274:1782: kāyo'nitya ityādi bhāvanayā tadālambane viharaṇaṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānam |
SA16n1274:1783: iyaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñayā saha kramaśo bhūyo vivṛddhā vedanāṃ vikalpayatīti vedanāsmṛtyupasthānam |
SA16n1274:1787: utpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmādīnavaṃ paśyan tatprahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati vīryamārabhate |
SA16n1274:1789: anutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāya chandaṃ janayati vīryamārabhate |
SA16n1274:1791: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādāya chandaṃ janayati vīryamārabhate |
SA16n1274:1793: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmaṇāṃ vaipulyāya chandaṃ janayati vīryamārabhate |
SA16n1274:1803: yogī sacchandaḥ savīryaśca cittasamādhiṃ prajñāñca bhāvayati |
SA16n1274:1808: saśraddhaḥ san saṃkleśadharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya vyavadānadharmāṇāmadhigamāya ca vīryamārabhate |
SA16n1274:1815: śrutamayaprajñaḥ śraddadhate pañcaskandhā anityā duḥkhā ityādi |
SA16n1274:1819: samyak saṅkalpenākuśalānāṃ prahāṇāya kuśalānāṃ karmaṇā bhāvanāyai ca yat vīryamācarati sa samyak vyāyāmaḥ |
SA16n1274:1820: tataḥ krameṇa pravrajitaḥ śīlamupādāya samyagvācaṃ samyak karmāntaṃ samyagājīvañca trīṇi mārgāṅgānyanuprāpnoti |

SA16n1274:1831: audārikīti yā śrutamayī cintāmayī ca prajñā |
SA16n1274:1833: sūkṣmeti bhāvanāmayī prajñā yā ūṣmādidharmagatā prajñaptisatpañcaskandhān vidārayati |

SA16n1274:1868: jñeyādidharmaskandha iti yaduta jñeyadharmā vijñeyadharmā rūpadharmā ārūpyadharmāḥ sanidarśanadharmā anidarśanadharmāḥ sapratighadharmā apratighadharmāḥ sāsravadharmā anāsravadharmāḥ saṃskṛta dharmā asaṃskṛtadharmāścittadharmā acittadharmāścaitasikadharmā acaitasikadharmāścittasaṃprayukta dharmāścittaviprayuktadharmāścittasahabhūdharmāścittāsahabhūdharmāścittānucaradharmāścittānanucaradharmā ādhyātmikadharmā bāhyadharmā audārikadharmāḥ sūkṣmadharmā uttamadharmā avaradharmāḥ sannikṛṣṭadharmā viprakṛṣṭadharmā upādānadharmā anupādānadharmā nairyāṇikadharmā anairyāṇikadharmāḥ prākṛtadharmā aprākṛtadharmāḥ samanantaradharmā asamanantaradharmāḥ kramikadharmā akramikadharmā ityevamādayo dvidhā dharmāḥ |

SA16n1274:1887: ṣaḍ saumanasyopavicārā ṣaḍ daurmanasyopavicārā ṣaḍupekṣopavicārāḥ ṣaḍ sucaritāni |
SA16n1274:1893: ityevamādayo dharmaskandhā apramāṇā anantā iti nāvasānaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate |
SA16n1274:1899: sanidarśanadharmā iti yāni rūpāyatanāni sapratidhadharmā iti rūpadharmāḥ |
SA16n1274:1900: sāsravadharmā iti ya āsravāṇāmutpādakā yathā anarhatāṃ prajñaptidharmeṣu cittam |

SA16n1274:1935: satyadarśanaheyadharmā iti yat strotaāpannānāṃ heyā nimittasandarśanāsmimānatajjā dharmāḥ |

SA16n1274:1942: duścarā duḥkhapratipat iti mṛdvindriyasya samādhiṃ labdhvā mārgacāriṇaḥ |

SA16n1274:1981: (4) āryāṇāṃ priyaṃ saṃvaraṃ labdhvā adhyāśayenāpi nāhamakuśalāni karomi ahamimaṃ saṃvaramupādāya triṣu ratneṣu ca śraddhāvāniti ca prajānāti iti yadiyaṃ śraddhā saṃvarabalāditi saṃvaraśraddhetyucyate ||

SA16n1274:2072: āryāṇāṃ cittameṣu daśasu sthāneṣu āvasatīti āryāvāsaḥ |

SA16n1274:2078: tadviparyayacittamupādāya karmāṇi sañcinotīti avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityucyante |
SA16n1274:2083: sarvā api vedanā anubhavan prajñaptimāśrayate ityatastatra tṛṣṇāṃ janayati |
SA16n1274:2089: tatra yaducyate avidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti tadatītādhvaprakāśanaṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭisamucchedakam |
SA16n1274:2090: jñāyate hi anādisaṃsāre ājavañjavibhāve karmakleśapratyayebhyaḥ kāyo vedyata iti |
SA16n1274:2100: tatpratyayaṃ phalaṃ yaduta vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca |
SA16n1274:2109: ya idaṃ samyacchāstraṃ niṣevate sa dharmāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā iti prajñāya na karmāṇi sañcinoti |
SA16n1274:2112: ata ātmahitaṃ satvahitañca kāmayamānaḥ kramaśastathāgatamārgaṃ prasādhya svadharmamādīpayan paradharmaṃ yo nirākaroti tenedaṃ śāstraṃ niṣevitavyam ||
SA16n1274:2133: kena pratyayena astīti vadanti kena pratyayena nāstīti |
SA16n1274:2134: (u) astīti yaḥ san dharmaḥ tatra cittamutpadyate |
SA16n1274:2144: sūtre coktam-ahaṃ prajānāmi nādhyātmamasti chandarāga iti |
SA16n1274:2145: uktañca sūtre-yathā yo rūpe chandarāgaḥ taṃ prajahīt |
SA16n1274:2147: yathā ca svapne asadapi mithyā [sat] paśyati |
SA16n1274:2150: ucyate | avidyamāne'pi jñānaṃ pracaratīti na bhavati |
SA16n1274:2159: yat na kiñcana vijānāti na tat vijñānam |
SA16n1274:2160: vijñānaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānāti vacanaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ rūpaṃ vijānāti yāvanmanovijñānaṃ dharmān vijānāti ityetasyābhidhānam |
SA16n1274:2163: kiñca anālambanaṃ vijñānamastīti vādinastat bhrāntaṃ syāt |
SA16n1274:2169: tasya jñānaṃ darśanaṃ veti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate iti |
SA16n1274:2174: natu tatroktam avidyamāno dharma ālambvyaṃ bhavatīti |
SA16n1274:2184: yathādhimukti avinīlakaṃ dṛṣṭvā vinīlakamiti paśyatīti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate |
SA16n1274:2190: asati sattve sattvābhāsaṃ paśyantīti māyā iti |
SA16n1274:2192: samādhibalāt tadasallakṣaṇaṃ bhavati na tu asattadbhavati |
SA16n1274:2198: tatra vastutaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ satyāmapi naivāsti na nāstīti vyapadiśyate |
SA16n1274:2202: ahaṃ prajānāmi nādhyātmamasti chandarāga iti yadbhavatoktam |
SA16n1274:2203: sa pañcanīvaraṇaviruddhāni saptabodhyaṅgāni dṛṣṭvā manaskāraṃ janayati-ahaṃ prajānāmi antaśchandābhāvamiti |
SA16n1274:2205: kiñcoktaṃ bhavatā-yat rūpe chandarāgaṃ prahīṇaṃ prajānāti |
SA16n1274:2209: tatra pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭaśrutasmṛtavikalpita bhāvitānyupādāya hi svapnadarśanam |
SA16n1274:2226: [yat]bhavānavocat cakṣurvijñānaṃ rūpaṃ vijānāti yāvanmanovijñānaṃ dharmān vijānāti iti |
SA16n1274:2227: tat vijñānaṃ viṣayamātraṃ vijānāti na vicinoti san vā asan vā iti |
SA16n1274:2234: kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti yadi saṃśayaḥ,
SA16n1274:2236: āha ca bhavān-yathoktaṃ sūtre yallokato'vidyamāna ātmā tasya jñānaṃ darśanaṃ veti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti |
SA16n1274:2237: idaṃ sūtraṃ na dharmalakṣaṇānugatam abuddhavacanaṃ tadābhāsaṃ vā |
SA16n1274:2242: asti asadālambanaṃ jñānamiti mama vacanaṃ na svato viruddham |
SA16n1274:2248: dharmāṇāṃ yatparamārthalakṣaṇaṃ tallakṣaṇairviyuktatvāt cittacaittā nālambamānā bhavanti |
SA16n1274:2265: nīlalakṣaṇālpamūlaṃ sarvāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ yat nīlaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1274:2267: tathā alpanīlabhāvanayā tu sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ yat nīlaṃ paśyati na tadabhūtadarśanam |
SA16n1274:2269: asati sattve sattvābhāsaṃ sattva iti paśyati |
SA16n1274:2272: āha ca bhavān-samādhibalāttallakṣaṇaṃ bhavati yathā vastutaḥ sadapi rūpaṃ śūnyatayāpohyata iti |
SA16n1274:2280: āha ca bhavān pañcanīvaraṇaviruddhāni saptabodhyaṅgāni dṛṣṭvā manaskāraṃ janayati ahamasat prajānāmīti |
SA16n1274:2284: bhavān bravīti-paramārthaprajñādarśanasya mithyādhimuktiṃ prati virodhitaiva chandarāgaprahāṇamiti |
SA16n1274:2286: ata ucyate chandarāgaprahāṇaṃ prajñāya rūpaprahāṇaṃ bhavatīti |
SA16n1274:2288: yat bhavān kathayati-svapne vastusan dṛśyata iti |
SA16n1274:2293: na tu yatna jñānaṃ pracaratīti sattālakṣaṇam ||
SA16n1274:2300: ayaṃ vādī vadati-skandhadhātvāyatanasaṅgṛhītaṃ vastu pṛthagjanadharmo na dharmalakṣaṇānugatam |
SA16n1274:2301: tathā cet tathatādayo'saṃskṛtadharmā api santaḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1274:2304: ato jñāyate skandhadhātvāyatanasaṅgṛhītā dharmā na sallakṣaṇā iti |
SA16n1274:2305: (pṛ) yat puruṣasya pratyakṣajñānādinā astyupalabhyamiti śraddhā bhavati tatsallakṣaṇam |
SA16n1274:2308: āha ca sūtram-jñānapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na vijñānapratiśaraṇena iti |
SA16n1274:2309: svabhāvalabdhatvāt rūpādayo viṣayā nopalambhanīyā iti paścādvakṣyate |
SA16n1274:2319: tadā punarvaktavyaṃ lokasatyato'tīto'nāgataśca kimasti uta nāsti iti |
SA16n1274:2327: ato jñāyate vartamānamātre santi pañca skandhāḥ |
SA16n1274:2329: atha yo dharmaḥ kāritravihīnaḥ sa svalakṣaṇavihīnaḥ |
SA16n1274:2356: atha yadyanāgataṃ sat cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati tadā sakāritraṃ syāt |
SA16n1274:2364: atha yadi ghaṭādayaḥ padārthāḥ anāgatāḥ santi |
SA16n1274:2368: kiñca bhagavānāhasaṃskṛtadharmā utpādavyayasthityanyathātvai strilakṣaṇā upalabhyante iti |
SA16n1274:2369: utpāda iti yo dharmaḥ pūrvamabhūtvā idānīṃ savyāpāro dṛśyate |
SA16n1274:2380: apicāha-yatkiñcana rūpamādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vā atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ vā [sarva] mabhisaṃkṣipya rūpaskandha iti |
SA16n1274:2399: tathāgataḥ svayameva vadati-yasya nāstyatītaṃ kṛtaṃ pāpakarma sa puruṣo naiva durgatau patiṣyati iti |

SA16n1274:2441: yasmātsattvā atītānanāgatān dharmān sātmano manyante tasmāt bhagavānevamavocat |

SA16n1274:2454: cittasyotpādo nātmani niśrayata iti ca viśadam |
SA16n1274:2462: tasya ca karmaṇo nirodhe'pi vipāko na praṇaśyati |
SA16n1274:2473: prākṛto jano mohādabhūtasmṛtyā pūrvagṛhītaṃ niyatalakṣaṇaṃ paścānniruddhamapi utpadyamāna[mivā]nusmarati |
SA16n1274:2481: bhavān bravīti-adhicittamadhivedanañca bhāvanā na bhavet iti |

SA16n1274:2546: āha ca-yamarājo'ntarābhave pāpinaḥ santarjya vyatyastaṃ pātayanti |

SA16n1274:2549: uktañca sūtre-divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati sattvān cyavamānānupapadyamānāṃśceti |

SA16n1274:2564: yadyāryā na jānanti-ayaṃ kaḥ kuta āgata iti |
SA16n1274:2571: anena brāhmaṇena kalpitam-anyaḥ kāyo'nyo jīva iti |
SA16n1274:2574: sa kāmarūpadhātvorantarā kāyamupādāya tatra parinirvṛta iti antarāparinirvāyī |
SA16n1274:2576: yathoktaṃ sūtre-kaścinmriyamāṇaḥ kutra gacchati kutrotpadyate kutra tiṣṭhati itīdamekārthakam |
SA16n1274:2577: bhavānāha-vyavakīrṇaṃ kāyamupādāya vyavakīrṇe loka utpadyata iti |
SA16n1274:2578: kāyamupādāyeti vacanaṃ loka utpadyata iti cedamekārthakam |
SA16n1274:2579: catvāro bhavāḥ sapta bhavā iti ca bhavaduktaṃ sūtramayuktam |
SA16n1274:2592: bhavānāha-mriyamāṇasya sūkṣmāṇi catvāri mahābhūtāni bhavāntaraṃ krāmantīti |
SA16n1274:2598: pūrvanivāsajñāna uktaṃ jānāti ayaṃ puruṣo'smilloke mṛtastasmilloka utpadyata iti na tūktam antarābhave tiṣṭhatīti |
SA16n1274:2608: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yadimaṃ kāyaṃ nikṣipan kāyāntaramupādatte tadahaṃ vadāmi upapattiriti |
SA16n1274:2634: nahi pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate cittaṃ santatyotpadyata iti |
SA16n1274:2636: na tatra pāde sthitaṃ vijñānaṃ bhavapratyayaṃ śirasi saṅkrāmati |
SA16n1274:2647: yathoktaṃ sūtre lokasya samudayaṃ paśyato nāstitādṛṣṭirna bhavati |
SA16n1274:2651: tasya virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dharmacakṣurbhavati | āha ca-
SA16n1274:2652: anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokaṃ stokaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe |
SA16n1274:2654: āsravakṣayasūtramāha jānataḥ paśyataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati iti |
SA16n1274:2655: pratipattupratidinaṃ kṣīyamāṇaṃ svayamajānato'pi sadā bhāvitatvāt āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati |
SA16n1274:2656: bhagavānāha satyeṣu udapadyata cakṣuḥ jñānaṃ vidyā prajñā iti |
SA16n1274:2659: sūtre ca bhagavān kaṇṭhata āha anupūrveṇa satyābhisamaya iti |
SA16n1274:2662: kleśānāñca catussatyeṣu caturdhā mithyācārā bhavanti yaduta nāsti dukhaṃ,
SA16n1274:2667: yogī ca cittaṃ samādhāya idaṃ duḥkhaṃ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodha iyaṃ duḥkhanigāminī patipat iti vikalpayet |
SA16n1274:2668: yadyekasmin citte syāt kathamevamanupūrveṇa samādhivikalpo bhavet |
SA16n1274:2673: bhavānāha lokasya samudayaṃ paśyato nastitādṛṣṭirna bhavati |
SA16n1274:2676: tathā cet ṣoḍaśabhiḥ cittakṣaṇaiḥ dvādaśabhirākāraiśca mārgo labhyata iti na syāt |
SA16n1274:2677: bhavatoktaṃ yatsamudayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ tannirodhalakṣaṇamiti prajānato dharmacakṣurbhavatīti |
SA16n1274:2678: tathā cet cittadvayena mārgalābhaḥ syāt-adyaṃ samudayacittaṃ dvitīyaṃ nirodhacittaṃ iti |
SA16n1274:2680: bhavānāha anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokaṃ stokaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe |
SA16n1274:2682: bhavatoktaṃ āsravakṣayasūtramāha rūpādīn jānataḥ paśyataḥ āsravānāṃ kṣayo bhavatīti |
SA16n1274:2685: bhagavān svayaṃ bravīti caturṣu satyeṣu jñānaṃ cakṣurvidyā prajñodapadyateti na bravīti anupūrveṇa ṣoḍaśacittakṣaṇāni bhavantīti |
SA16n1274:2686: bhavatoktaṃ bhagavān kaṇṭhenāha-anupūrveṇa satyabhisamayaḥ śreṇyārohaṇavat iti |
SA16n1274:2693: evaṃ ca ṣoḍaśabhireva cittakṣaṇairmārgalābha iti na syāt |
SA16n1274:2697: [yogino] na [nānā] satyāni bhavanti kintu ekameva satyaṃ bhavati yaduta duḥkhanirodhadarśanamādyābhisambodhi nāmakam |
SA16n1274:2698: dṛśyadharmādīnāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt yogī ūṣmagatādidharmānupūrveṇa caramanirodhasatyarūpaṃ satyaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1274:2704: (pṛ) kena kāraṇena parihīyate kena kāraṇena na parihīyate |
SA16n1274:2706: yathoktaṃ sūtre-pañca hetavaḥ pañca pratyayāḥ samayavimuktasyārhataḥ parihāṇāya saṃvartante |
SA16n1274:2714: āha ca sūtram dvividho'rhan parihāṇalakṣaṇo'parihāṇalakṣaṇa iti |
SA16n1274:2715: api coktaṃ sūtre yadyamuko bhikṣuḥ vimuktimukhāt parihīyate tadidaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate iti |
SA16n1274:2717: kumbhopamaṃ kāyamidaṃ viditvā nagaropamaṃ cittamidaṃ sthāpayet |
SA16n1274:2718: yudhyeta māraṃ prajñāyudhena jitañca rakṣedaniveśanaḥ syāt || iti |
SA16n1274:2726: dapadyata ityādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ jñātavyaṃ parihīyata iti |
SA16n1274:2729: kecidvadanti āryamārgānna parihīyate dhyānasamādheḥ paraṃ parihīyata iti |
SA16n1274:2730: (pṛ) tathā cet arhan dvividho na syāt |
SA16n1274:2735: yathā gaudhiko bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍvāraṃ [cetovimukteḥ] parihīṇaḥ asinā ātmānaṃ jaghāna |
SA16n1274:2738: tathāgatāśāsane hi vimuktiḥ pradhānā na samādhiḥ |
SA16n1274:2740: tasmāt samādheḥ cyutasyānāsravaṃ cyavate na tu anāsravātparihīyate |
SA16n1274:2742: yathāha gāthā-kṣīṇaṃ purāṇaṃ na navo'sti sambhavo viraktacittā āyatike bhave ca |
SA16n1274:2743: te kṣīṇabījā aviruḍhacchandā nirvānti dhīrā yathāyaṃ pradīpaḥ || iti |
SA16n1274:2744: kiñcāha-śailo yathā caikaghano vātena na samīryate |
SA16n1274:2745: evaṃ nindāpraśaṃsāsu na samiñjanti paṇḍitāḥ | iti |
SA16n1274:2758: yeṣāmāsravāḥ kṣīṇāḥ na teṣāṃ punarāsravā bhavanti |
SA16n1274:2760: kiñcāha-vidvāna kuśalabhāvanaḥ kuśalavāk kuśalakāyakarmāntaḥ karaṇīyānna cyavata iti |
SA16n1274:2763: uktañca sūtre-mṛgā vanāśrayā eva vihagā gaganāśrayāḥ |
SA16n1274:2771: āha ca-dharmān mithyābhāvayato bhikṣostraya āsravāḥ prādurbhavanti iti |
SA16n1274:2772: arhan punarna mithyābhāvayatīti na ta āsravāḥ prādurbhavanti iti |
SA16n1274:2773: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre-ya āryaprajñayā prajānāti na sa parihīyate |
SA16n1274:2775: kīñcārhan tisro vedanāḥ samyak prajānāti [tāsā]mutpādalakṣaṇaṃ nirodhalakṣaṇamāsvādalakṣaṇaṃ mārgalakṣaṇaṃ nissaraṇalakṣaṇañcetyato notpādayati saṃyojanam |
SA16n1274:2776: kiñcāha-yo bhikṣuḥ śīlasamādhiprajñākhyai stribhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa na parihīyate |
SA16n1274:2780: yathoktaṃ sūtre-satyavihārī āryo naiva parihīyata iti |
SA16n1274:2784: kiñcārhan akopyāṃ [ceto] vimuktiṃ sākṣātkṛtatvān ityato na parihīyate |
SA16n1274:2785: arhan tathāgataśāsane sāramarthaṃ pratilabdhavān yadutākopyā cetovimuktiḥ |
SA16n1274:2786: kasyacit karacchedavat tatsmaraṇe'smaraṇe ca sadā karacchedo'styeva |
SA16n1274:2789: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre-śraddhādināmindriyāṇāṃ tīkṣṇatvāt arhan bhavati iti |
SA16n1274:2792: tadyathā dahano'dagdhaṃ dahati dagdhvā ca napunastatra pratyāvartate |
SA16n1274:2793: evaṃ bhikṣuḥ ekā daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgata ityato na kadāpi parihīyate |
SA16n1274:2799: jinaścet punarutpannaḥ syāt ucyate na tu so jinaḥ
SA16n1274:2800: jino bhūtvā na jāyet tātvikaḥ sa jino mataḥ || iti |
SA16n1274:2801: yo'rhan punaḥ kleśānutpādayati na sa jino bhavet |
SA16n1274:2802: arhataḥ kṣīṇajātitvāt na punaḥ kāyo vedyate |
SA16n1274:2803: bhavataḥ sūtraṃ yadyapyāha-arhan parihāṇadharmā punaḥ parihīyeta iti |
SA16n1274:2817: kleśā hi sadā cittena saha saṃprayogajāḥ |
SA16n1274:2824: yaḥ kleśaḥ sahajo bhavati na sa āgantuka ityucyate |
SA16n1274:2829: cittamidaṃ tatkāla eva niruddhaṃ na malanimittavat bhavati |
SA16n1274:2830: cittaṃ tatkāla eva vinaṣṭaṃ kena malena lipyate |
SA16n1274:2839: kintu tathāgataḥ cittaṃ nityaṃ sthāyīti vadatāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛta āha āgantukamalakliṣṭaṃ sat cittamapariśuddhamiti |
SA16n1274:2840: kiñca kusīdasattvā ye śṛṇvanti cittaṃ prakṛtito'pariśuddhamiti |
SA16n1274:2842: na te cittavyavadānamārabheran ityataḥ tathāgata āha prakṛtipariśuddhamiti ||
SA16n1274:2853: bhavatāṃ śāsane yadyapyucyate cittaviprayukto'nuśayaḥ cittasamprayuktasaṃyojanaparyavasthānasya hetuṃ karotīti |
SA16n1274:2856: uktaṃ hi sūtre-avidyā'yoniśomanaskāramithyāsaṅkalpādibhyo rāgādīni saṃyojanani prādurbhavanti iti |
SA16n1274:2864: yujyata iti cet sarve'pi dharmāḥ pratyutpanna hetorupadyeran nātītahetoḥ |
SA16n1274:2865: tathā ca na karmajo vipākaḥ syāt |
SA16n1274:2867: anuśayānāmeṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt kathaṃ punaste janakahetavaḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1274:2875: śāstramāha-kāśyapīyā vadanti ananubhūtavipākaṃ karma atīte'dhvani asti |
SA16n1274:2886: yathā payo nirodhe daghno hetukṛtyaṃ karoti |
SA16n1274:2900: yadi mataṃ tathāgataḥ catasṛṣu pariṣatsu antargataḥ yaduta sattvapariṣat prāṇipariṣat manuṣyapariṣat āryapariṣat iti |
SA16n1274:2902: yadi mataṃ tathāgataḥ śrāvakapariṣadi antargata iti |
SA16n1274:2906: (pṛ) saṅghārāmāgragasya tathāgatasya dāyakaḥ puruṣaḥ saṅghadāyaka ityucyate |
SA16n1274:2910: (pṛ) bhagavān gautamīmavocat- imaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghe dehi |
SA16n1274:2911: tadā ahamapi pūjito bhaviṣyāmi saṅgho'pi ca |
SA16n1274:2914: yathoktaṃ sūtre yo rogaprekṣī sa māṃ paśyati |
SA16n1274:2921: ato jñāyate na bhagavān saṅgāntargata iti |
SA16n1274:2922: kiñca bhagavān na saṅghakarmapraviṣṭaḥ nāpi anyasaṅghavastusamaḥ |
SA16n1274:2931: yathā bahuṣu sūtreṣu tathāgato bhikṣūnāha-nāmamātrataḥ prajñaptimātrata upayogamātrataḥ pudgala ityucyate |
SA16n1274:2933: nāmamātrata ityādinā jñāyate na paramārtha iti |
SA16n1274:2935: yo na paśyati duḥkhañca sa ātmānantu paśyati |
SA16n1274:2936: duḥkhadarśī yathābhūtaṃ sa ātmānaṃ na paśyati || iti |
SA16n1274:2940: api ca sūtre bhagavānavocat-yatrāsmīti tatreñjitam iti |
SA16n1274:2941: yadvastu sat na tatreñjitaṃ bhavati yathā cakṣuḥ,
SA16n1274:2943: tatra tatra sūtre ca ātmavādaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ |
SA16n1274:2945: kiṃ nu satveti pratyeṣi māradṛṣṭigataṃ nu te |
SA16n1274:2951: kiñcāha- nāstyātmā na cātmīyaṃ na sattvo nāpi mānavaḥ |
SA16n1274:2969: bimbisārapratyudgamanasūtre bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha-vibhāvayata yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ prākṛtānāṃ prajñaptimanurudhya vadāmi astyātmeti |
SA16n1274:2972: kiñcāha-pañcaskandhānupādāyāsti nānāvidhaṃ nāma yaduta ātmā sattvo mānavo deva iti |
SA16n1274:2976: sthavirapūrṇakaḥ kaścit tīrthikaḥ āha-yadi puruṣo mithyādṛṣṭayā asantamastīti vadati |
SA16n1274:2978: yamakasūtre śāriputro yamakamavocat-kiṃ yamaka samanupaśyasi rūpaskandho'rhan iti |
SA16n1274:2980: kiṃ samanupaśyasi vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānamarhan iti |
SA16n1274:2986: yadevaṃ parimṛgya [dṛṣṭa eva dharme satyataḥ sthirataḥ] nopalabhyate |
SA16n1274:2987: tatkalyaṃ nu te vyākaraṇaṃ arhan [kāyasya bhedāducchidyate vinaśyati] na bhavati paraṃ maraṇāditi |
SA16n1274:2988: abhūtkhalu me [āyuṣman] śāriputra pūrvaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigatam,
SA16n1274:2989: idaṃ punarāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā tacca pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ prahīṇam |
SA16n1274:2996: uktañcaśreṇikasūtre-trayāṇāṃ śāstṝṇāṃ yo nopalabhate pratyutpannamātmānamūrdhvabhāvinaṃ vātmānaṃ tamahaṃ śāstāraṃ buddhaṃ vadāmi iti |
SA16n1274:2999: yadi mataṃ satyātmani ātmeti saṃjñā na viparyāsa iti |
SA16n1274:3020: astyekāntata ātmeti yo vadati sa ṣaṇṇāṃ mithyādṛṣṭīnīmanyatamasyāmanupatati |
SA16n1274:3026: paramārthatastu astyātmeti brūvato hi doṣo bhavati |
SA16n1274:3030: api cātmadṛṣṭimūloddharaṇāyāha bhagavān yathā mogharāja [māṇava]pṛcchāyāṃ bhagavān mogharājaṃ pratyāha-
SA16n1274:3033: evaṃ lokamavekṣantaṃ] mṛtyurājo na paśyati || iti
SA16n1274:3039: kasmāt caturṣu vyākaraṇeṣu caturtha sthapanīyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yaduta bhavati puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt na bhavati [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt] bhavati ca na bhavati ca [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt],
SA16n1274:3040: naiva bhavati na na bhavati [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt] |
SA16n1274:3043: ūrdhvakāyavedakaḥ sattvo nāstīti yat keṣāñcit vacanam |
SA16n1274:3046: tatra bhagavānevamāha-tasmin samaye ahameva mahāsudarśano rājā evaṃkāya ityādi |
SA16n1274:3047: pūrvakebhya utpannā idānīntanāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ na tu purāṇā eva |
SA16n1274:3057: ekatyaḥ pudgala utpadyate loke bahūnāṃ vipattyanutāpāya |
SA16n1274:3058: ekatyaḥ pudgala utpadyate loke bahūnāṃ lābhāya |
SA16n1274:3059: yat kuśalākuśalakarmaṇāṃ samudācaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ tat sattvopagam |
SA16n1274:3060: tatra tatra ca sūtre bhagavān svayamāha-ahaṃ vadāmi sattvā ūrdhvakāyaṃ vedayante iti |
SA16n1274:3075: yathā bālakānāṃ nāmamātreṇa vastudānaṃ savipākaṃ syāt |
SA16n1274:3078: nāmamātrato'sadapi astīti vādina āryā mṛṣāvādinaḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1274:3084: yadi vyavahārato'sadapi astīti vadatāṃ punaḥ sūtragatāni pāramārthikāni dvādaśanidānāni trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityādi vacanaṃ na syāt |
SA16n1274:3085: asti paraloka iti vādinamanusṛtya vadanti astīti |
SA16n1274:3087: vadanti ca loke ayutāni vastūni īśvarādutpannani |
SA16n1274:3091: ato bhavatodāhṛtaṃ sūtraṃ sarvaṃ sāmānyato dūṣitameva |
SA16n1274:3093: atrocyate | yadbhavatā pūrvamuktaṃ sthapanīyavyākaraṇāt astyātmeti jñāyata iti |
SA16n1274:3097: ato nāsti paramārthata ātmā avaktavya iti |
SA16n1274:3100: yathāha bhavatāmāgamaḥ cakṣuṣā dṛśyamānaṃ rūpamupādāyetyato vināśyātmā |
SA16n1274:3102: tadā na vaktavyaṃ na rūpaṃ nārūpamiti |
SA16n1274:3112: yat cakṣurvijñānavijñeyaṃ na tat rūpamiti bravīṣi |
SA16n1274:3114: sūtre bhagavān svayaṃ bhikṣūnāmantryāha-asatyapyātmani saṃskārāṇāṃ santānamupādāya jananamaraṇamastīti vadāmi |
SA16n1274:3115: paśyāmi ca divyena cakṣuṣā sattvānutpadyamānān mriyamāṇāṃśca |
SA16n1274:3118: bhavatāṃ śāsane hyucyate ātmā na jāyata iti |
SA16n1274:3121: anyānyapi pāpakarmāṇi na santi ityato bhavatāṃ śāsanameva mithyādarśanam |
SA16n1274:3124: ta eva pañcaskandhāḥ santatyā buddho bhavati |
SA16n1274:3126: bhavatāṃ śāsane ātmana ekatvāt viśeṣo na syāt |
SA16n1274:3128: sūtre bhagavān idaṃ vastu pratiṣidhyāha-nāhaṃ vadāmi kaścidimān pañcaskandhān parityajya tān skandhānupādatta iti |
SA16n1274:3136: na hi sambhavati tasya saṃkleśasamayaṃ [sattva] upādatta iti |
SA16n1274:3137: kintu prajñaptyā hetupratyayānāṃ saṃkliṣṭatvāt āha-sattvāḥ saṃkliśyanta iti |
SA16n1274:3140: bhavatāṃ śāsane cocyate na pañcaskandhā evātmeti |
SA16n1274:3142: vayantu vadāmaḥ pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā ātmeti |
SA16n1274:3143: imamātmānamupādāya asti janma asti nirodhaḥ puṇyapāpamityādi |
SA16n1274:3147: abhūtasaṃjñayā bhavānevaṃ kalpayati na tathā bhagavadāśayaḥ |
SA16n1274:3148: vividhā ātmavādāḥ sarve duṣṭāḥ yathā bhavān bravīti-pañcaskandhān vihāya anyo'styātmeti tīrthikā manyanta iti |
SA16n1274:3167: loke ca nāsti ko'pi dharma eka ityavaktavyaḥ |
SA16n1274:3169: (pṛ) yathā agnirindhanañca na vaktuṃ śakyata evaṃ vā nānā veti |
SA16n1274:3188: evamātmāpi pañcaskandhaiḥ saha triṣu adhvasu vartamānaṃ syāt |
SA16n1274:3191: yadyapi bhavānāha-agnirindhanena naiko na nānā iti |
SA16n1274:3200: bhavāṃstu abhūtasaṃjñayā imamātmānaṃ vikalpya keṣāṃ hitaṃ prāpayati |
SA16n1274:3202: ṣaḍvijñānavijñeya iti bhavatokta ātmā na ṣaḍviṣayarūpo bhavati |
SA16n1274:3205: caturṣu satyeṣu asaṅgraprahītaśca na satyeṣu bhavati |
SA16n1274:3207: bhavatāṃ śāsana ucyate jñeyadharmā yaduta pañcadharmakośāḥ-atītā anāgatāḥ pratyutpannā asaṃskṛtā avaktavyā iti |
SA16n1274:3210: sa caturbhyo dharmebhyo'nya itīcchanti khalu bhavantaḥ |
SA16n1274:3214: ato bhavatā pūrvamuktam-tīrthikāḥ pañcaskandhān vihāya pṛthagātmā'stīti manyante |
SA16n1274:3220: jinaśāsane hyucyate lokasatyavastu na pragāḍhaṃ cintanīyam iti |
SA16n1274:3225: yadavocadbhavān lokoktāni sarvāṇi anusartavyāni yadvadanti īśvarādutpannāni na yutāni vastūni ityādi |
SA16n1274:3232: savijñānānāṃ skandhānāṃ santatyā samudācāre sati asti karma asti vipākaḥ |
SA16n1274:3234: tasmāt pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā ātmā ityākhyāyate |
